block.p: American League BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Traded C Charles Johnson and DH Harold Baines to the Chicago White Sox for C Brook Fordyce, RHP Miguel Felix, RHP Juan Figueroa and RHP Jason Lakman. Acquired 1B Chris Richard and RHP Mark Nussbeck from St. Louis for RHP Mike Timlin and cash. BOSTON RED SOX--Assigned INF Sean Berry outright to Pawtucket of the International League. CLEVELAND INDIANS--Optioned RHP Tim Drew to Buffalo of the International League. Designated RHP Jaime Navarro for assignment. OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Optioned LHP Todd Belitz and RHP Ariel Prieto to Sacramento of the PCL.

American League BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Traded C Charles Johnson and DH Harold Baines to the Chicago White Sox for C Brook Fordyce, RHP Miguel Felix, RHP Juan Figueroa and RHP Jason Lakman. Acquired 1B Chris Richard and RHP Mark Nussbeck from St. Louis for RHP Mike Timlin and cash. BOSTON RED SOX--Assigned INF Sean Berry outright to Pawtucket of the International League. CLEVELAND INDIANS--Optioned RHP Tim Drew to Buffalo of the International League. Designated RHP Jaime Navarro for assignment. OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Optioned LHP Todd Belitz and RHP Ariel Prieto to Sacramento of the PCL.

National League ARIZONA DIAMONDBACKS--Optioned RHP Byung-Hyun Kim to Tucson of the PCL. Called up RHP Johnny Ruffin from Tuscon. ATLANTA BRAVES--Signed RHP Stan Belinda. FLORIDA MARLINS--Placed OF Cliff Floyd on the 15-day disabled list. Purchased the contract of SS Mendy Lopez from Calgary of the PCL. HOUSTON ASTROS--Traded RHP Doug Henry to San Francisco for RHP Scott Linebrink. MILWAUKEE BREWERS--Designated OF Chris Jones for assignment. NEW YORK METS--Activated 3B Robin Ventura from the 15-day disabled list. PHILADELPHIA PHILLIES--Traded OF Ron Gant to Anaheim for RHP Kent Bottenfield. PITTSBURGH PIRATES--Traded LHP Jason Christiansen to St. Louis for SS Jack Wilson. ST. LOUIS CARDINALS--Optioned RHP Gene Stechschulte to Memphis of the PCL.
Pacific Coast League CALGARY CANNONS--Recalled INF Joe Funaro from Portland of the Eastern League.
Florida State League JUPITER HAMMERHEADS--Announced INF Garret Osilka has been promoted to Harrisburg of the Eastern League.
Women's National Basketball Association PHOENIX MERCURY--Signed G Nicole Kubik. Placed G Michelle Cleary on the injured list.

National Football League CHICAGO BEARS--Signed WR Dee Miller. GREEN BAY PACKERS--Claimed S Ray Austin off waivers from Chicago. Waived LB Kivuusama Mays and WR Tyrone Goodson. NEW YORK GIANTS--Waived CB Jermaine Jones. SEATTLE SEAHAWKS--Announced the retirement of QB Dave Krieg. TAMPA BAY BUCCANEERS--Released WR Darnell McDonald. WASHINGTON REDSKINS--Waived RB Norman Miller.
National Hockey League MINNESOTA WILD--Agreed to terms with F Scott Pellerin. PITTSBURGH PENGUINS--Signed D Janne Laukkanen to a three-year contract.
East Coast Hockey League MISSISSIPPI SEA WOLVES--Named Al Pedersen coach.

BINGHAMTON--Named Annette Acuff men's and women's cross country coach. Promoted Mike Thompson to director of track and cross country. EVERGREEN STATE--Named Kyle Nelson athletic trainer, Mike Velasquez men's assistant soccer coach and Renee Kuehner women's assistant basketball coach. Announced the resignation of Mike Westphal, swimming and diving coach. JACKSONVILLE--Named Shawn Trent defensive line coach. UPPER IOWA--Named Brian Thiessen sports information director.
